mapper.select:
SELECT COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_NAME FROM T_COMPANY_INFO
COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCompany}, '%')
ORDER BY COMPANY_NAME
LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_COMPANY_INFO WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCompany}, '%')

select COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_NAME, MANAGER_ID, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = MANAGER_ID) AS MANAGER_NAME, NOTES, GROUP_CODE, USE_YN as companyuseYn from T_COMPANY_INFO where COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} ORDER BY COMPANY_NAME

SELECT GROUP_CODE, GROUP_NAME, CODE_DESCRIPTION FROM T_GROUP_CODE ORDER BY GROUP_NAME
LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_GROUP_CODE ORDER BY GROUP_NAME
SELECT GROUP_CODE, GROUP_NAME, CODE_DESCRIPTION, USE_YN as GROUPUSEYN FROM T_GROUP_CODE where GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode}
SELECT GROUP_CODE, USER_ID, USER_NAME, GROUP_ID FROM T_GROUP_AUTH where GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode}

SELECT TUI.USER_NAME, TUI.USER_ID, TUI.COMPANY_ID, TCI.COMPANY_NAME, CASE WHEN TUI.USER_CLASS = 'USER' THEN '일반사용자' WHEN TUI.USER_CLASS = 'ADMIN' THEN '관리자' WHEN TUI.USER_CLASS = 'SYSADMIN' THEN '최고관리자' END AS USER_CLASS FROM T_USER_INFO TUI LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY_INFO TCI ON (TUI.COMPANY_ID = TCI.COMPANY_ID)
TUI.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%') OR TUI.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%') OR TCI.COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%')
ORDER BY TUI.USER_NAME
LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_USER_INFO TUI LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY_INFO TCI ON (TUI.COMPANY_ID = TCI.COMPANY_ID)
AND TUI.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%')
AND TUI.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND TCI.COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCompany}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_COMPANY_INFO( COMPANY_NAME, MANAGER_ID, UPDATE_DT, UPDATE_ID, NOTES, GROUP_CODE, USE_YN )VALUES ( #{companyName}, #{managerId}, NOW(), #{userId}, #{notes}, #{groupCode}, 'Y' )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_COMPANY_INFO SET COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName}, MANAGER_ID = #{managerId}, NOTES = #{notes}, GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode}, UPDATE_DT = NOW(), UPDATE_ID = #{userId}, USE_YN = #{companyuseYn} WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}
